data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The cheerleader was typically an ebullient and joyful girl, but lately she had been feeling indifferent about her role. When ____ she ____ have ____ and ____ louder ____ more ____ than ____ else, she ____ felt ____ by ____ football ____. Perhaps it was time for her to move on to more adult pastimes.
data.partBlankContent: The cheerleader was typically an ebullient and joyful girl, but lately she had been feeling indifferent about her role. When norm____ she wo___ have che____ and perf_____ louder a__ more enthusia________ than any___ else, she n__ felt unins_____ by t__ football ga___. Perhaps it was time for her to move on to more adult pastimes.
data.answer: 啦啦队长是一个典型的热情洋溢、快乐的女孩，但最近她对自己的角色感到冷漠。正常情况下，她会比其他人更大声、更热情地欢呼、表演，但现在，她对足球比赛感到灰心丧气。也许是时候让她转向更成熟的消遣方式了。
